mapper.update:
update DeliveryCompany
DeliveryCompanyName = #{deliverycompanyname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
DeliveryCompanyCode = #{deliverycompanycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IsEnable = #{isenable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SettleType = #{settletype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ClienterFixMoney = #{clienterfixmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ClienterSettleRatio = #{clientersettleratio,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DeliveryCompanySettleMoney = #{deliverycompanysettlemoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DeliveryCompanyRatio = #{deliverycompanyratio,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BusinessQuantity = #{businessquantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ClienterQuantity = #{clienterquantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CreateName = #{createname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
ModifyName = #{modifyname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
ModifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IsDisplay = #{isdisplay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update DeliveryCompany set DeliveryCompanyName = #{deliverycompanyname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, DeliveryCompanyCode = #{deliverycompanycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IsEnable = #{isenable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SettleType = #{settletype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ClienterFixMoney = #{clienterfixmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ClienterSettleRatio = #{clientersettleratio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DeliveryCompanySettleMoney = #{deliverycompanysettlemoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DeliveryCompanyRatio = #{deliverycompanyratio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BusinessQuantity = #{businessquantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ClienterQuantity = #{clienterquantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CreateName = #{createname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, ModifyName = #{modifyname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, ModifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IsDisplay = #{isdisplay,jdbcType=INTEGER} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.sql:
(SELECT a.deliveryCompanyName , a.id as deliveryCompanyID, a.deliveryCompanyCode , cast(YEAR(c.AuditDate) as varchar(10))+''/''+cast(Month(c.AuditDate) as varchar(10)) as auditDate, SUM(b.RealOrderCommission) AS clienterTotalSettleMoney , SUM(b.DeliveryCompanySettleMoney) AS companyTotalSettleMoney , COUNT(0) AS taskTotalNum , SUM(b.OrderCount) AS orderTotalNum , SUM(b.Amount) AS amountTotalNum FROM DeliveryCompany a JOIN [order] b ON a.Id = b.DeliveryCompanyID JOIN dbo.OrderOther c ON b.id = c.OrderId WHERE b.DeliveryCompanyID > 0 AND c.IsJoinWithdraw = 1 and c.AuditDate is not null
and a.deliveryCompanyName=''${deliveryName}''
AND c.AuditDate >= ''${start}''
AND ''${end}'' > c.AuditDate
GROUP BY a.id, a.DeliveryCompanyName , a.DeliveryCompanyCode, cast(YEAR(c.AuditDate) as varchar(10))+''/''+cast(Month(c.AuditDate) as varchar(10)) ) mt
